Home > external > metacyc > getEnzymesFromMetaCyc.m

getEnzymesFromMetaCyc

PURPOSE

getEnzymesFromMetaCyc

SYNOPSIS

function metaCycEnzymes=getEnzymesFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)

DESCRIPTION 

 getEnzymesFromMetaCyc
    Retrieves all enzymes and reaction-enzyme association information in MetaCyc

   Input:
    metacycPath  if metaCycEnzymes.mat is not in the RAVEN\external\metacyc
                directory, this function will attempt to build it by reading
                info from a local dump of MetaCyc database, and metacycPath
                is the path to the MetaCyc data files

   Output:
    model        a model structure generated from the database. The following
                fields are filled
                id:             'MetaCyc'
                name:    'Automatically generated from MetaCyc database'
                rxns:           Reaction id
                rxnNames:       Reaction name
                enzymes:        Enzyme id
                enzrxns:        Enzymatic-reaction id
                cplxs:          Enzyme complexes
                cplxComp:       Subunit components of enzyme complexes
                rxnEnzymeMat    A binary matrix that indicates association of a
                                specific enzyme to the reactions it catalyze
                version:        MetaCyc database version

    If the file metaCycEnzymes.mat is in the RAVEN\external\metacyc directory
    it will be loaded. Otherwise, it will be generated by parsing the MetaCyc
    database files. In general, this metaCycEnzymes.mat file should be removed
    and rebuilt when a newer version of MetaCyc is released.

    Usage: model=getEnzymesFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)

NOTE: This is how one entry looks in the files

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
This function is called by:
  • getModelFromMetaCyc getModelFromMetaCyc

0002 % getEnzymesFromMetaCyc
0003 %    Retrieves all enzymes and reaction-enzyme association information in MetaCyc
0004 %
0005 %   Input:
0006 %    metacycPath  if metaCycEnzymes.mat is not in the RAVEN\external\metacyc
0007 %                directory, this function will attempt to build it by reading
0008 %                info from a local dump of MetaCyc database, and metacycPath
0009 %                is the path to the MetaCyc data files
0010 %
0011 %   Output:
0012 %    model        a model structure generated from the database. The following
0013 %                fields are filled
0014 %                id:             'MetaCyc'
0015 %                name:    'Automatically generated from MetaCyc database'
0016 %                rxns:           Reaction id
0017 %                rxnNames:       Reaction name
0018 %                enzymes:        Enzyme id
0019 %                enzrxns:        Enzymatic-reaction id
0020 %                cplxs:          Enzyme complexes
0021 %                cplxComp:       Subunit components of enzyme complexes
0022 %                rxnEnzymeMat    A binary matrix that indicates association of a
0023 %                                specific enzyme to the reactions it catalyze
0024 %                version:        MetaCyc database version
0025 %
0026 %    If the file metaCycEnzymes.mat is in the RAVEN\external\metacyc directory
0027 %    it will be loaded. Otherwise, it will be generated by parsing the MetaCyc
0028 %    database files. In general, this metaCycEnzymes.mat file should be removed
0029 %    and rebuilt when a newer version of MetaCyc is released.
0030 %
0031 %    Usage: model=getEnzymesFromMetaCyc(metacycPath)
0032 %
0033 %NOTE: This is how one entry looks in the files
0034 
0035 %proteins.dat
0036 % UNIQUE-ID - MONOMER-8570
0037 % TYPES - Polypeptides
0038 % COMMON-NAME - D-carnitine dehydrogenase subunit
0039 % COMPONENT-OF - CPLX-5143
0040 % MOLECULAR-WEIGHT-EXP - 23
0041 % MOLECULAR-WEIGHT-KD - 23
0042 % SPECIES - ORG-6256
0043 % //
0044 
0045 %enzrxns.dat
0046 % UNIQUE-ID - ENZRXN-14974
0047 % TYPES - Enzymatic-Reactions
0048 % COMMON-NAME - (1S,4R)-iso-dihydrocarvone monooxygenase
0049 % BASIS-FOR-ASSIGNMENT - :MANUAL
0050 % CITATIONS - 10769172:EV-EXP-IDA-PURIFIED-PROTEIN:3419689584:caspi
0051 % COFACTORS - FAD
0052 % ENZYME - MONOMER-13964
0053 % PHYSIOLOGICALLY-RELEVANT? - T
0054 % REACTION - RXN-9435
0055 % REGULATED-BY - REG-12241
0056 % REGULATED-BY - REG-12240
0057 % TEMPERATURE-OPT - 35
0058 
0059 % A line that contains only '//' separates each object.
0060 
0061 %Check if the enzymatic proteins have been parsed before and saved. If so,
0062 %load the model.
0063 ravenPath=findRAVENroot();
0064 enzymesFile=fullfile(ravenPath,'external','metacyc','metaCycEnzymes.mat');
0065 metaCycProteinFile='proteins.dat';
0066 metaCycEnzrxnsFile='enzrxns.dat';
0067 
0068 if exist(enzymesFile, 'file')
0069     fprintf(['Importing MetaCyc enzymes and reaction-enzyme association from ' strrep(enzymesFile,'\','/') '... ']);
0070     load(enzymesFile);
0071     fprintf('done\n');
0072 else
0073     fprintf(['Cannot locate ' strrep(enzymesFile,'\','/') '\nNow try to generate it from local MetaCyc data files...\n']);
0074     if ~exist(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycProteinFile),'file') || ~exist(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycEnzrxnsFile),'file')
0075         EM=fprintf(['The files of enzymes or proteins cannot be located, and should be downloaded from MetaCyc.\n']);
0076         dispEM(EM);
0077     else
0078         metaCycEnzymes.id='MetaCyc';
0079         metaCycEnzymes.name='Automatically generated from MetaCyc database';
0080         
0081         %Reserve space for 10000 enzyme complexs
0082         metaCycEnzymes.cplxs=cell(10000,1);
0083         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp=cell(10000,1);
0084         metaCycEnzymes.enzymes=cell(50000,1);
0085         
0086         %Get the information of protein complexes and their components
0087         nCplx=0;
0088         enzymeCounter=0;
0089         
0090         fid = fopen(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycProteinFile), 'r');
0091         %Loop through the file
0092         while 1
0093             tline = fgetl(fid);
0094             
0095             %Abort at end of file
0096             if ~ischar(tline)
0097                 break;
0098             end
0099             
0100             %Add Enzyme id
0101             if numel(tline)>12 && strcmp(tline(1:12),'UNIQUE-ID - ')
0102                 enzymeCounter=enzymeCounter+1;
0103                 addMe=false;
0104                 enzymeID=tline(13:end);
0105                 metaCycEnzymes.enzymes{enzymeCounter}=enzymeID;
0106             end
0107             
0108             %Check if enzyme complexes
0109             if strcmp(tline(1:end),'TYPES - Protein-Complexes')
0110                 nCplx=nCplx+1;
0111                 nComp=0;
0112                 
0113                 %Reserve 100 subunits for each enzyme complex
0114                 Comp.subunit=cell(100,1);
0115                 metaCycEnzymes.cplxs{nCplx}=enzymeID;
0116                 
0117                 addMe=true;
0118             end
0119             
0120             if numel(tline)>13 && strcmp(tline(1:13),'COMPONENTS - ')
0121                 if addMe
0122                     nComp=nComp+1;
0123                     Comp.subunit{nComp}=tline(14:end);
0124                 end
0125             end
0126             
0127             if strcmp(tline(1:end),'//')
0128                 if addMe
0129                     Comp.subunit=Comp.subunit(1:nComp);
0130                     metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{nCplx}=Comp;
0131                     addMe=false;
0132                 end
0133             end
0134         end
0135         %Close the file
0136         fclose(fid);
0137         
0138         %If too much space was allocated, shrink the model
0139         metaCycEnzymes.cplxs=metaCycEnzymes.cplxs(1:nCplx);
0140         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp=metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp(1:nCplx);
0141         metaCycEnzymes.enzymes=metaCycEnzymes.enzymes(1:enzymeCounter);
0142         
0143         % Iteratively go through the components of each complex
0144         for i=1:numel(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp)
0145             
0146             %replace all complex-type components with their subunits
0147             checkCplx=true;
0148             while checkCplx
0149                 x=0;
0150                 mat=[]; %Matrix for component of protein-complexs
0151                 for j=1:numel(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit)
0152                     [a, b]=ismember(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit{j},metaCycEnzymes.cplxs);
0153                     if a
0154                         x=x+1;   %record this value j, and the cplx id b
0155                         mat(x,:)=[j b];
0156                     end
0157                 end
0158                 
0159                 if isempty(mat)
0160                     checkCplx=false; % No complexs found among components
0161                 else
0162                     %go through matrix JB
0163                     for k=1:x
0164                         %disp(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit{mat(k,1)});
0165                         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit(mat(k,1))=[];
0166                         metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit=[metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit; metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{mat(k,2)}.subunit];
0167                     end
0168                 end
0169                 
0170             end
0171             
0172             % make sure the subunits are all included in the enzyme list
0173             % since in one case subunit was not found in enzyme dump file
0174             [a, b] = ismember(metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit,metaCycEnzymes.enzymes);
0175             if ~all(a)
0176                 metaCycEnzymes.cplxComp{i}.subunit = metaCycEnzymes.enzymes(b(find(a)));
0177             end
0178         end
0179         
0180         %Preallocate space for 500000 enzymatic reactions
0181         metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns=cell(50000,1);
0182         metaCycEnzymes.rxns=cell(50000,1);
0183         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames=cell(50000,1);
0184         metaCycEnzymes.commoname=cell(50000,1);
0185         metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat=sparse(50000,enzymeCounter); % row: rxn, column: enzymes
0186         
0187         %Load enzyme and reaction association information
0188         fid = fopen(fullfile(metacycPath,metaCycEnzrxnsFile), 'r');
0189         
0190         %Keeps track of how many enzymes and reactions have been added
0191         enzrxnCounter=0;
0192         nRxn=0;
0193         
0194         %These contain the mapping between Reactions and Enzymes Loop
0195         %through the file
0196         while 1
0197             tline = fgetl(fid);
0198             
0199             %Abort at end of file
0200             if ~ischar(tline)
0201                 break;
0202             end
0203 
0204             % Get the version of MetaCyc database
0205             if numel(tline)>11 && strcmp(tline(1:11),'# Version: ')
0206                 metaCycEnzymes.version=tline(12:end);
0207             end
0208 
0209             %Check if it is a new enzymatic reaction
0210             if numel(tline)>12 && strcmp(tline(1:12),'UNIQUE-ID - ')
0211                 enzrxnCounter=enzrxnCounter+1;
0212                 metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns{enzrxnCounter}=tline(13:end);
0213                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}='';
0214             end
0215             
0216             %Add common name of enzymatic reactions
0217             if numel(tline)>14 && strcmp(tline(1:14),'COMMON-NAME - ')
0218                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=tline(15:end);
0219                 
0220                 %Remove HTML symobls
0221                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'<(\w+)>','');
0222                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'</(\w+)>','');
0223                 metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter}=regexprep(metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter},'[&;]','');
0224             end
0225             
0226             % I add one cell array rxns for checking existing ones by
0227             % ismember because I cannot manage field rxns in this function
0228             
0229             %Add enzyme name
0230             if numel(tline)>9 && strcmp(tline(1:9),'ENZYME - ')
0231                 
0232                 %Save the index in enzymes field to nEnzyme
0233                 [x, nEnzyme]=ismember(tline(10:end),metaCycEnzymes.enzymes);
0234                 if ~x
0235                     %disp(tline(10:end));
0236                 end
0237             end
0238             
0239             %Add reaction id, and rxnNames by concatenating unique common
0240             %names
0241             if numel(tline)>11 && strcmp(tline(1:11),'REACTION - ')
0242                 nRxn=nRxn+1;
0243                 rxns{nRxn}='';
0244                 rxnID=tline(12:end);
0245                 [c, d]=ismember(rxnID,rxns);
0246                 if c
0247                     nRxn=nRxn-1;
0248                     
0249                     %Check if this common name has been included by
0250                     %rxnNames
0251                     k=strfind(metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d},metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter});
0252                     if isempty(k)
0253                         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d}=strcat(metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{d},';',metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter});
0254                     end
0255                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(d,nEnzyme)=1;
0256                 else
0257                     metaCycEnzymes.rxns{nRxn}=rxnID;
0258                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames{nRxn}=metaCycEnzymes.commoname{enzrxnCounter};
0259                     rxns{nRxn}=rxnID;
0260                     metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(nRxn,nEnzyme)=1;
0261                 end
0262             end
0263             
0264         end
0265         
0266         %Close the file
0267         fclose(fid);
0268         
0269         %Shrink the sizes
0270         metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns=metaCycEnzymes.enzrxns(1:enzrxnCounter);
0271         metaCycEnzymes.commoname=metaCycEnzymes.commoname(1:enzrxnCounter);
0272         metaCycEnzymes.rxns=metaCycEnzymes.rxns(1:nRxn);
0273         metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames=metaCycEnzymes.rxnNames(1:nRxn);
0274         metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat=metaCycEnzymes.rxnEnzymeMat(1:nRxn,:);
0275         
0276         %Save the model structure
0277         save(enzymesFile,'metaCycEnzymes');
0278         fprintf(['New metaCycEnzymes.mat has been successfully updated!\n\n']);
0279     end
0280     
0281 end
0282 end
